text:
The Chronicle’s analysis of data on electric car buyers shows the stark disparities:
▪️68% of buyers were men.
▪️Only 5% were Hispanic/Latino; fewer than 2% were Black
▪️72% of buyers reported a household income above $100,000.

name: sfchronicle
text:
Just how risky was the birthday party that Gov. Newsom attended at a ritzy Napa Valley restaurant?

According to a modeling tool, if held today, there’s an 11% to 12% chance that one of the dinner guests was infected with the coronavirus. https://t.co/W2uqmMFRGY
